name: Sleeping Flowers: Thread Curse
description:
Sleeping Flowers: Thread Curse is an arcade game with pixel-art style graphics, where you control two characters and a thread that connects them. Be careful with the dangers and defeat the enemies that appear in each wave.

The enemies will constantly try to hit you, unless you defeat them with the RAINBOW power. Overcome the waves that will become more challenging, with a variety of enemies and increasing their number.

The game is designed to be played both individually and cooperatively with a partner sharing the same screen. The communication and coordination is a must!

Unlock new sceneries, skills and outfits for your characters using the randomized gachapon machine. No more boring duplicate items! Each time unlock is a new item!

Each scenery you unlock has its own particularity, with advantages, disadvantages and/or new characters. The sceneries will rotate as you overcome the waves.

The game features short cutscenes that explain the context of the story. Will you rescue little Sharklotte trapped in the last gachapon capsule?
